video.title: Legacies
video.synopsis: Born into a rare supernatural bloodline, Hope Mikaelson attends a gifted private school to master her powers and control her evil impulses.

episodes.synopsis: Hope begins a new year at The Salvatore School for the Young and Gifted, and reunites with an old friend who doesn't exactly belong.
episodes.title: This Is the Part Where You Run

episodes.synopsis: Hope, Alaric and Rafael hunt down Landon and a missing magical artifact only to discover a fire-breathing woman.
episodes.title: Some People Just Want to Watch the World Burn

episodes.synopsis: While Hope, Lizzie and Josie are punished for breaking the rules, an evil gargoyle terrorizes the school. Landon and Rafael rough it in the woods.
episodes.title: We're Being Punked, Pedro

episodes.synopsis: When two mean girls go missing, Hope, Lizzie and MG attend the high school for humans to investigate. Landon and Rafael struggle to find their place.
episodes.title: Hope Is Not the Goal

episodes.synopsis: As elections for honor council cause tension within each supernatural faction, Hope tests Landon to determine his lineage.
episodes.title: Malivore

episodes.synopsis: Surprises abound for Josie and Lizzie’s sweet 16 birthday, including an unexpected visitor that resurrects old wounds for the Saltzman clan.
episodes.title: Mombie Dearest

episodes.synopsis: While interrogating the newest demon to arrive at Salvatore School, Hope faces her darkest fears. Meanwhile, Rafael makes peace with his past.
episodes.title: Death Keeps Knocking on My Door

episodes.synopsis: As they track Landon across the country, Hope and Alaric uncover dark secrets about his family and Malivore.
episodes.title: Maybe I Should Start from the End

episodes.synopsis: During a stressful week of exams, Hope, Rafael, MG and Landon are tormented by a dream demon. Rafael begins to develop feelings for Hope.
episodes.title: What Was Hope Doing in Your Dreams?

episodes.synopsis: After her return from Europe, Lizzie meets a jinni who grants her wishes that reveals a devastating secret.
episodes.title: There's a World Where Your Dreams Come True

episodes.synopsis: When enchanting slugs lower their inhibitions, the students' true feelings emerge during the annual talent show.
episodes.title: We're Gonna Need a Spotlight

episodes.synopsis: Alaric, Hope, Josie, Lizzie, Kaleb, Dorian and Emma band together to retrieve the mythical urn and try to keep their superpower abilities under wraps.
episodes.title: There's a Mummy on Main Street

episodes.synopsis: Rafael, MG and Landon take an impromptu road trip with deadly consequences. Hope, Alaric and Kaleb scramble to piece together what happened.
episodes.title: The Boy Who Still Has a Lot of Good to Do

episodes.synopsis: As the school hosts the Miss Mystic Falls pageant, Hope’s superpowers malfunction. MG and Landon deal with the fallout from the night of the full moon.
episodes.title: Let's Just Finish the Dance

episodes.synopsis: Josie discovers the secret Alaric has been keeping while Lizzie helps Landon and Hope reconcile.
episodes.title: I'll Tell You a Story

episodes.synopsis: After unsuspecting forces descend upon the school, the entire crew fights back. Hope makes a sacrifice to save Landon and take down Malivore.
episodes.title: There's Always a Loophole

episodes.synopsis: Hope discovers a possible escape route. Dismissed as headmaster, Alaric investigates Malivore's destruction. The students leave for summer vacation.
episodes.title: I'll Never Give Up Hope

episodes.synopsis: On a hunt, Hope struggles to leave the past behind. Landon's new popularity causes tension with Josie. The students meet new headmaster Vardemus.
episodes.title: This Year Will Be Different

episodes.synopsis: As Salvatore prepares for its annual football game against Mystic Falls, Lizzie tries to learn more about Sebastian. Alaric faces off against Vardemus.
episodes.title: You Remind Me of Someone I Used to Know

episodes.synopsis: Josie must defend her friends against a demon that is also being hunted by a samurai. Landon and Rafael head to Mystic Falls to learn more about Hope.
episodes.title: Since When Do You Speak Japanese?

episodes.synopsis: Hope and Lizzie become trapped in a labyrinth. Josie and Landon consider taking their relationship to the next level. At school, Rafael tries to adjust.
episodes.title: Screw Endgame

episodes.synopsis: Hope and Lizzie fear the secrets they're keeping will be revealed by a truth-seeking monster. Freya receives a visit from a Salvatore student.
episodes.title: That's Nothing I Had to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Hope decides to leave town but gets pulled into Josie's risky plan to close the Malivore portal. Alaric and Dorian make a discovery about Vardemus.
episodes.title: It Will All Be Painfully Clear Soon Enough

episodes.synopsis: Hope and an unlikely ally take down a Christmas monster. Landon shares his family history with Rafael. Sebastian goes on a mission with Lizzie.
episodes.title: This Christmas Was Surprisingly Violent

episodes.synopsis: The Necromancer returns for revenge. Hope tries to mend fences with Josie. Alaric begins investigating Sebastian to see if he is a threat to the school.
episodes.title: I Couldn't Have Done This Without You

episodes.synopsis: A monster wreaks havoc on Coven Day. Alaric and Lizzie work to protect Josie from dark magic inside the mora miserium. Landon asks Hope for training.
episodes.title: This Is Why We Don't Entrust Plans to Muppet Babies

episodes.synopsis: Hope sets out to save her friends in danger. Landon tries to prove himself against the latest monster. MG's date with Kym doesn't go according to plan.
episodes.title: What Cupid Problem?

episodes.synopsis: Circumstances take Josie, Lizzie and Alaric to the prison world, where they encounter a familiar face.
episodes.title: Kai Parker Screwed Us

episodes.synopsis: Pressure mounts for Hope, who races against time to rescue the Saltzmans. Alaric must make a painful decision in trying to protect his family members.
episodes.title: You Can't Save Them All

episodes.synopsis: To cope with recent traumas, the students enter a simulation that takes them to a film noir world and forces them to confront their conflicts.
episodes.title: There's a Place Where the Lost Things Go

episodes.synopsis: The twins' 17th birthday takes a dark turn. Hope clashes with Alaric over an issue involving Josie. Rafael makes a heartbreaking discovery.
episodes.title: Life Was So Much Easier When I Only Cared About Myself

episodes.synopsis: Hope enters Josie's subconscious mind and discovers a world of dark magic. Alaric, Lizzie and the Super Squad hatch their own plan to save her.
episodes.title: Facing Darkness Is Kinda My Thing

episodes.synopsis: Hope remains asleep but Landon doesn't stay in the afterlife for long, thanks to the Necromancer. Rafael uncovers his ancient Arthurian ancestry.
episodes.title: We're Not Worthy

episodes.synopsis: The Super Squad scrambles to find a way to save Rafael when he is afflicted with the same fatal condition that has taken the lives of several others.
episodes.title: Goodbyes Sure Do Suck

episodes.synopsis: A sprite disguises itself as a Salvatore counselor and sows chaos by convincing the students to stage a musical about the school's founding.
episodes.title: Salvatore: The Musical!

episodes.synopsis: As their first anniversary approaches, Hope and Landon celebrate. Alaric leads a mission to destroy the Necromancer's monsters at Mystic Falls High.
episodes.title: Hold on Tight

episodes.synopsis: When she uses Professor Vardemus's therapy box to find Landon, Hope is transported to a 1980s summer camp and is stalked by a masked killer.
episodes.title: This is What It Takes

episodes.synopsis: Lizzie and Hope host orientation for new students despite the school being in danger of shutting down.
episodes.title: To Whom It May Concern

episodes.synopsis: A leprechaun affects the school's fundraiser, forcing Hope and Cleo to fight. At Mystic Falls, Josie makes an interesting new acquaintance.
episodes.title: Yup, It's a Leprechaun, All Right

episodes.synopsis: Believing that Landon is still alive, Hope demands the Super Squad mount a rescue attempt, but they're wary of releasing Malivore.
episodes.title: Long Time, No See

episodes.synopsis: Alaric investigates a mysterious artifact's history, while Lizzie and Hope reluctantly work together to stop a gremlin that feeds on disrespect.
episodes.title: Do All Malivore Monsters Provide This Level of Emotional Insight?

episodes.synopsis: Hope suspects that Cleo has been targeted by Malivore, who sends a banshee to capture her. Josie's growing relationship with Finch takes a turn.
episodes.title: All's Well That Ends Wells

episodes.synopsis: Hope astral-projects into the prison world seeking a deal with the Necromancer that would destroy Malivore. Alaric learns more about the artifact.
episodes.title: You Can't Run From Who You Are

episodes.synopsis: Landon's behavior alarms Hope, who sets out to discover what is behind his sudden changes. Josie and Alaric locate the Necromancer.
episodes.title: I Was Made To Love You

episodes.synopsis: Cleo's tortured past with Malivore is revealed. Landon tells Hope that they are destined to destroy each other. Finch decides to stay at Salvatore.
episodes.title: One Day You Will Understand

episodes.synopsis: Hope accompanies Josie and Lizzie to a wellness retreat for witches. Finch challenges Jed for Alpha with a game of pool.
episodes.title: This Feels a Little Cult-y

episodes.synopsis: Dosed with a drug, Hope, Josie and Lizzie find themselves trapped in a hallucinatory sci-fi narrative then try to end the story and free themselves.
episodes.title: A New Hope

episodes.synopsis: Cleo and Landon attempt to kill Malivore with a relic stolen from a museum, while Hope and a transformed Clarke realize the truth about Landon.
episodes.title: Fate's a Bitch, Isn't It

episodes.synopsis: Hope and the Super Squad devise a risky plan to rescue Landon and Cleo. Josie avoids discussing a certain subject during a date with Finch.
episodes.title: You Have to Pick One This Time

episodes.synopsis: Trapped in Malivore's darkness, Landon and Cleo learn more about each other, while Hope must relinquish control of the operation to rescue them.
episodes.title: There's No I in Team, or Whatever

episodes.synopsis: Faced with a difficult choice, Hope seeks help from Josie and Lizzie, while Kaleb and MG come up with their own way of supporting her.
episodes.title: We All Knew This Day Was Coming

episodes.synopsis: Hope struggles with her reality. Cleo confides in Landon, while MG divulges something important to Lizzie. Finch sees an unfamiliar side of Josie.
episodes.title: See You On The Other Side
